001package gbw.melange.tooling;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.events.OnClick;
004import gbw.melange.common.events.interactions.Key;
005import gbw.melange.common.hooks.OnRender;
006import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
007import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
008import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
009import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
010
011@Service
012public class DevTools implements OnRender {
013    private static final Logger log = LogManager.getLogger();
014
015    private SuperDicyInternalReferences sdir = null;
016    private float xTrans = 0, yTrans = 0, zTrans = 0;
017
018    private boolean[] enabled = new boolean[]{false};
019
020    @Autowired
021    public DevTools(OnClick click){
022        click.keyDown(Key.F1, () -> {
023            log.info("Enabling Dev tools");
024            enabled[0] = true;
025        });
026        click.whileKeyHeld(Key.W, () -> zTrans -= .1f);
027        click.whileKeyHeld(Key.A, () -> xTrans -= .1f);
028        click.whileKeyHeld(Key.S, () -> zTrans += .1f);
029        click.whileKeyHeld(Key.D, () -> xTrans += .1f);
030        click.whileKeyHeld(Key.SPACE, () -> yTrans += .1f);
031        click.whileKeyHeld(Key.SHIFT_LEFT, () -> yTrans -= .1f);
032    }
033
034    public void setSdir(SuperDicyInternalReferences sdir){
035        this.sdir = sdir;
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public void onRender(double deltaT) {
040        if(sdir.mainCam() != null){
041            sdir.mainCam().position.set(xTrans, yTrans, zTrans);
042            sdir.mainCam().update();
043        }
044    }
045}
